metadata.title: CVE-2013-1963 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The contacts application in ownCloud before 4.5.10 and 5.x before 5.0.5does not properly check the ownership of contacts, which allows remoteauthenticated users to download arbitrary contacts via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-1963` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
